Detailed Description

Coordinates the execution of a map-reduce job in a single thread.

This means that the data source is fed tuple by tuple to the mapper, the output tuples are collected, split according to their keys, and each list is sent to the reducer, again in a sequential fashion. As such, the SequentialWorkflow reproduces exactly the processing done by map-reduce, without the distribution of computation. It is best suited to pedagogical and debugging purposes.
